description: large flat wooden box (a) with lid (b); two colorful cloth inlay pieces, one large and one small, attached to top of lid; cavities for two small books below, a larger album above; two marigold colored cloths for wrapping smaller books; one large marigold color cloth for large book
signed: on paper label inside box lid, black ink: [Japanese writing] / 2011 [Japanese] No. 2/3 / Fukumoto Shigeki / [Japanese, red seal]
title: Shredded Message portfolio box
